entries.journalEntry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.
We went through objects and how to loop through them. We learned about key-value pairs and proper syntax for them. We also delved into using for loops in functions
I went through the remainder problems in the muscle memory work for functions. I then finished the scope problems. I then started the Daily-Journal project.
I learned about sorting orders on the DOM.
